from vpython import *

canvas(width=700, height=400)

Height_I = 5  # initial_height

    height = Height_I
    ball.pos = vector(0, height, 0)

def update_height():

# Objects

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, Height_I, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red)

dt = 0.01  # time step
g = 9.81  # acceleration due to gravity

while True:
    rate(100)
    ball.pos.x += ball.velocity.x * dt
    ball.velocity.y -= g * dt

    if ball.pos.y - ball.radius <= ground.pos.y:  # Collision with ground
        ball.velocity.y *= -1

    if ball.pos.y <= ground.pos.y:
